event.description: {CovLStrv2{The Spring Boot application's data source is configured to disable SSL by setting the `spring.datasource.url` attribute to a value without `useSSL=true`. Thus, sensitive data transmitted over an insecure communication channel could be read and modified by attackers.}}
{CovLStrv2{Explicitly enable SSL by setting the `spring.datasource.url` attribute to a value that contains `useSSL=true`.}}

typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: The Spring Boot application's data source is configured to disable SSL by setting the `spring.datasource.url` attribute to a value without `useSSL=true`. Thus, sensitive data transmitted over an insecure communication channel could be read and modified by attackers.
